full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 31 of 261 1171
LC6Cmax1 Kate - direct
1 A. It's my driver's license.
2 Q. Is that your current legal name?
3 A. Yes.
4 MS. POMERANTZ: Your Honor, the government offers Government Exhibit 18 under seal.
5
6 MS. STERNHEIM: No objection.
7 THE COURT: GX18 is admitted under seal consistent with my ruling to protect this witness's anonymity.
8 (Government's Exhibit 18 received in evidence)
9
10 Ms. Pomerantz, do you wish to publish to the jury?
11 MS. POMERANTZ: Yes, your Honor, if we can now publish to the jury, please.
12
13 THE COURT: Members of the jury, you may open your binder and look at GX18, please.
14
15 BY MS. POMERANTZ:
16 Q. Kate, how far did you go in school?
17 THE COURT: I'll ask the members of the jury to put their binders away, please.
18
19 MS. POMERANTZ: Thank you, your Honor.
20 Q. Kate, how far did you go in school?
21 A. I finished some high school.
22 Q. What kind of work do you do now?
23 A. I work with mainly women who suffer with trauma and substance use disorder.
24
25 Q. What kind of work did you do before that?
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00018368
